cards.title: Currency Converter
cards.subtitle: A form that will convert your money from one currency to another.

cards.title: Retirement Calculator
cards.subtitle: This form will calculate the year of your retirement and how many years you have left to work.

cards.title: Simple Math
cards.subtitle: This is a simple calculator - enter two numbers, and four different mathematical operations will be performed for you.

cards.title: Tip Calculator
cards.subtitle: This form allows you to enter the subtotal of your bill and add a tip rate. It will output your tip and your total bill.

cards.title: Mad Lib
cards.subtitle: This form asks you to enter a bunch of words so you can generate a funny Mad Lib.
